explains: n. 外表；虚饰；饰面；胶合板的一层；薄木片
vt. 胶合；虚饰；给……镶以饰片

sentences.en: He was able to fool the world with his veneer of education.
sentences.cn: 他能够通过对自己的教育背景加以虚饰来愚弄世人。

sentences.en: Her veneer of politeness began to crack.
sentences.cn: 她那彬彬有礼的伪装开始露馅儿了。

sentences.en: The wood was cut into large sheets of veneer.
sentences.cn: 这些木料被切割成了大块的饰面薄板。
